channel.title: BackGround
channel.description: I have changed the background before 1k times but i cant seem to find the image in my folers ... ive changed alot of it already and when i went to go change the background BAM i cant find the picture ... is there a way i can make it so it loads my backround insted like add it to a folder and change one of the codes... cuz if not im ass fucked

item.title: BackGround
item.dc:creator: @d_man103456 d man103456
item.description:
@d_man103456 wrote:

go into Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.java and search for the name of your background image. You should see something like

Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().getImage("/Sprites/background.png/");

Then just replace it with the new directory you want you background image to be at and what the name of the image will be, sort of like if you wanted to put it in the data folder and name it mybackground.png

Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().getImage("/data/mybackground.png/");

Read full topic
